Lucy bụ aha nwanyị Bekee e nyere aha sitere na Latin nwoke e nyere aha Lucius nke pụtara ìhè (amụrụ n'isi ụtụtụ ma ọ bụ n'ehihie, ikekwe na-egbu maramara, ma ọ bụ nke ìhè)
Ntụgharị asụsụ ọzọ bụ Luci, Luce, Lucie, Lucia na Luzia.￼
.Aha nna Lucy nke Bekee sitere na asụsụ Norman nke sitere na Latin wee nweta aha ebe na Normandy dabere na aha nwoke Latin Lucius
Ebufere ya na England ka Norman meriri na narị afọ nke 11 (leekwa De Lucy)
